Analyze your data with ![](/images/galaxy_logo_25percent_transparent.png){height="1em"} and the ![](/images/W4M_icon.svg){height="1em"} infrastructure! 
  
The next Workflow4Experimenters session (![](/images/W4E_icon.svg){height="1em"}2025) will take place from **12th to 16th of May 2025**. During this one-week course (entirely in English), you will learn how to use the W4M infrastructure and analyze your own LC-MS, GC-MS, or NMR data. 

Since 2023 an online pre-session is organised from **Monday 28th to Wednesday 30th of April 2025**. This session is *only accessible to person who will be present in Rouen for the onsite session.*

::: callout-important
[WILL ARRIVE SOON] Agenda and preregistration: [registration form]() (Deadline XX/XX/2025)
